pages.text: Even with a list of enchantments that you can barely read anymore due to its length, there are still few blocks that escape your gaze of superiority.\\[#](bb00bb)Obsidian[#](), you are getting cancelled today.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Higher mining speed the harder a block is to break.\\Max Level: 3\Applicable to mining tools.\Mutually exclusive with Fortune.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Razing by surrounding your [Enchanter](book://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](book://general/pigment) and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Razing from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.\This price will quickly increase to more and more [Pigment](book://general/pigment) and experience for each additional level.
